content.rendered:
Pubcon New Orleans 2013 Pictures

So I bought a new camera recently and wanted to test it out during some of the sessions I was in at Pubcon Nola. No, I didn’t just get the camera for a business write off.  I am going to keep adding to this page. Feel free to use the photos however you would like I just ask that you mention were they came from. Thanks!
